attributes.action: Stop Making Celebrities Immune to the Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How often is it you hear of celebrities in this country actually being sent to prison or sentenced to any kind of punishement; not very often. I won't name names but I feel there is a double standards culture where they can get away with almost anything especially traffic offences

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
